BasicInfo.short: Tiny Prints operates two e-commerce brands offering cards, invitations, personalized stationery and photo books.

Products.name: Tiny Prints
Products.description: Tiny Prints, Inc. operates an online boutique that offers stylish cards, invitations, personalized stationery, and photo books.
